means: 气喘的，患气喘的，发出去呼哧声的

sentence.Network_en: As an asthmatic, he cannot cope with the heat and humidity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他患有哮喘病，经不起高温和潮湿。

sentence.Network_en: One child in ten is asthmatic.
sentence.Network_cn: 每十个孩子里就有一人患有气喘病。

sentence.Network_en: He is an asthmatic who was also anaemic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个曾患贫血症的哮喘患者。

list.abs: <篇首> 哮喘性支气管炎(Asthmatic bronchitis)为一种特殊类型的支气管炎,系指婴幼时期有哮喘表现的支气管炎,常继发于上呼吸道感染后,婴幼儿症状较重.作者发现.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek asthmatikos, from asthma (see asthma)

entry.tran: 气喘病患者；哮喘病患者
entry.def: People who suffer from asthma are sometimes referred to as asthmatics .

example.ex: I have been an asthmatic from childhood and was never able to play any sports.
example.tran: 我从小就患有气喘病，参加不了任何体育活动。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to breathing with a whistling sound

auth_sentence.content: "I was asthmatic growing up," Martin said.

auth_sentence.content: That is according to an article in Environmental Health News, bad news in a city with lots of asthmatic children.

sentences.en: His illness left him subject to asthmatic attacks.
sentences.cn: 他的病使他容易出现哮喘发作。
